description: Experimental urlbar APIs. Non-experimental urlbar APIs are at browser.urlbar.

functions.name: setDefaultPref
functions.description: Sets a pref on the default branch.

functions.name: resetDefaultPref
functions.description: "Resets" a pref on the default branch that was previously set with setDefaultPref. The pref will be set to the original value that it had before setDefaultPref was first called.
